{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1111101,"totalDownVotes":118232,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":460846,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
I want to sincerely thank all of you who voted for Brookhaven and the amazing people in the Roblox community who come to play it. I was humbled to be nominated and am beyond grateful to be chosen, especially with so many incredible games and creators to choose from.

Thx for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4209876,"totalDownVotes":768687,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":257708,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3758383,"totalDownVotes":309675,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":82142,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Você pode resolver o mistério e sobreviver a cada rodada?

Colete e troque centenas de facas!


Twitter: @NikilisRBX

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":606076,"totalDownVotes":46716,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":58271,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":523261,"totalDownVotes":36701,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":46061,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Collect them all!

And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":262087,"totalDownVotes":33334,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"(2x Item-Spawns) Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":23197,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2069455,"totalDownVotes":286524,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":49396,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼Violet and her little brother Bud are hosting an Egg Hunt! Ready to run fast and crack open Sur-Prize Eggs?🌼

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1016883,"totalDownVotes":51099,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":30797,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Player Multiplier Limit: 2.25q

👊Latest Update [UPDATE 18]:
- 💸SALE!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":138914,"totalDownVotes":7721,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":17164,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2126042,"totalDownVotes":655831,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":66038,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¿Puedes ser el primero en llegar a la cima de este obby generado aleatoriamente sin ningún punto de control?

Si piensas que estas listo puedes probar la torre que contiene todas las 150 secciones aquí:
https://www.roblox.com/games/2127551566/THE-Tower-of-Hell

Los dueños de servidores VIP pueden usar los siguientes commandos
/setLength [3-150] para cambiar el tamaño de la torre seguido de
/skip para conseguir la próxima torre

Pedimos perdón por las personas que no pueden usar Shift-Lock debido a Roblox enlazando chat a Shift+7 en algunos teclados. Es un problema de Roblox que no podemos solucionar."},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2318396,"totalDownVotes":243556,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":56043,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Credits:

TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1414543,"totalDownVotes":118718,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":29470,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Construa o seu barco e navegue em uma aventura em curso ao tesouro!

Gostou do jogo? Não esqueça de entrar em nosso grupo! 
https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2782840

Bônus do Grupo:

✨Membro✨ - Bônus de 25% mais ouro! 
💫Mega Membro💫 - Bônus de 300% de vida e 25% de ouro!
🌟Membro Nobre🌟 - Bônus de 4 Barris de TNT; 300% de vida e 25% de ouro!
"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":694081,"totalDownVotes":94332,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":21247,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":266713,"totalDownVotes":140889,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":24331,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1186327,"totalDownVotes":67738,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":17146,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1792840,"totalDownVotes":139914,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8444,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
New skins added to Creator Case and Meme 2 Case
Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":220078,"totalDownVotes":19681,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":17176,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3100
There are 30 Physical Fruits In Game

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":659799,"totalDownVotes":128012,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":7364,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

Earn in-match money by eliminating enemies and playing objectives, which you can use to buy new weapons, gear and grenades at the start of each round.

Press B to open buy menu at spawn, press N to open menu.

Enjoy FPS games? We've made four other FPS games you can play!
Check them out: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=2613928




"},{"creatorId":3250407,"creatorName":"Block Evolution Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":236457,"totalDownVotes":24492,"universeId":1230230722,"name":"🏠 FAMILY HOME! Club Roblox","placeId":3457390032,"playerCount":29216,"imageToken":"T_3457390032_bedf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏠 ROLEPLAY FAMILY HOME UPDATE!

Please give a Thumbs Up & Favourite!

[Bonus] 💎 Join Block Evolution Studios for promo codes!
---------------------------------------------------------------- 
Developed by Block Evolution Studios ©
"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":185605,"totalDownVotes":30505,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ GOJO & HIEI ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":7629,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":9277770,"creatorName":"Anime Legend Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":95917,"totalDownVotes":7777,"universeId":2317140681,"name":"[JOJO UPDATE] Anime Mania","placeId":6284881984,"playerCount":9236,"imageToken":"T_6284881984_34ef","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"This is Anime Mania. Upon joining the game, it is suggested that you spend some of the gems that you have rolling on a few characters. Then you should equip 3 of these characters in order to make your team. After making your team, you can play the game by starting a room and you can either invite your friends or play alone. Obtain more characters, win the arenas, and upgrade your characters! 

PC Controls:
Left Click: Basic Attack
Right Click: Heavy Attack
1,2,3,4- Character Skills
Jump + Left Click: Up Combo
Left Click In air: Air finish or simply use a move.

Inspired by Ani-Blox Legends, and All Star Tower Defense.

Owners: 123imnotm0mo and Yakrus
Developers: jacobman737, Lazarovip2,F33NY
Contributors: Swingset68, Arricku,Elikage,LightTheProtagonist, Rinanori"},{"creatorId":5446074,"creatorName":"Emotes CO.","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":148801,"totalDownVotes":12546,"universeId":2047210140,"name":"[NEW MAP | NEW EMOTES] 🕺 TTD 3","placeId":5771467270,"playerCount":17091,"imageToken":"T_5771467270_b633","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌏 A whole new map to explore! 🌏
🕺 Chronoshift, Balletic, Get Griddy, Oh shoot a rat and tons of new Effect Emotes! 🕺
⚙️ Improvements & Fixes ⚙️
✨ Tokens and Donation Board added! ✨
➡️ Find more about our update in 'Patch Notes' Below! ⬅️

👋 Welcome to TTD 3 👋
TTD 3 is a game based on dancing with friends and meeting new ones! 
We offer over 170+ Emotes that are available from the beginning!

We don't tolerate any violations of the ROBLOX TOS, Depending on the violation of any rules mentioned in the TOS, we'll take action immediately.

• [Click to Sync] New sync system in testing!
• [/togglesync] Toggle's syncing for you so that other player's cannot sync with you!
• [/respawn] To refresh your avatar while keeping the same position and camera angle!

Game Credits: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/ttd-3-game-credits
Patch Notes: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/ttd-3-patch-notes"},{"creatorId":1730435200,"creatorName":"SnowdustDev","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":152118,"totalDownVotes":66867,"universeId":1852226622,"name":"Gacha Online| Custom OC RP⭐ (Roleplay)","placeId":5289509545,"playerCount":22977,"imageToken":"T_5289509545_1eec","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"➡️ Gacha Online's content is 100% free, supported by your donations and premium playtime! ⬅️

( Game Version 1.415 - 3/6/21 )

~~~~~~~ Welcome to Gacha Online BETA! ~~~~~~~ (*・ω・)ﾉ
Customize your Gacha OCs in Roblox, just like Gacha Life -- ⭐BUT MULTIPLAYER!⭐

Have fun Roleplaying, Exploring, and just hanging out with new friends!
-- Make Gacha Mini Movies live and with your friends!
-- Customize your characters right next to your buddies!
-- COMPLETELY FREE CUSTOMIZATION!

-- Made with ❤️ by Snowdust --

Remember to like 👍 the game, and tell your friends about it!

This is an official fangame of the Gacha Club and Gacha Life series made by Lunime.
You can find them on the app store!

Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
